tossup_question: 4) PHYSICS  What is the apparent weight of the person when the elevator is accelerating downwards?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Equal to Actual Weight
X) Less than Actual Weight
Y) Greater than Actual Weight
Z) 0
tossup_answer: ANSWER: X) Less than Actual Weight
bonus_question: 4) PHYSICS  The forces acting at a point are called as:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Concurrent Forces
X) Collinear Forces
Y) Coplanar Forces 
Z) Unit Forces
